@id.description: Identical to the `dwc:measurementID`. An identifier for the dwc:MeasurementOrFact (information pertaining to measurements, facts, characteristics, or assertions). May be a global unique identifier or an identifier specific to the data set

@type.description: The type of the digital object, in this case a ods:Assertion

dwc:measurementID.description: An identifier for the dwc:MeasurementOrFact (information pertaining to measurements, facts, characteristics, or assertions). May be a global unique identifier or an identifier specific to the data set

dwc:parentMeasurementID.description: An identifier for a broader dwc:MeasurementOrFact that groups this and potentially other ods:Assertions

dwc:measurementDeterminedDate.description: The date on which the dwc:MeasurementOrFact was made

dwc:measurementAccuracy.description: The description of the potential error associated with the dwc:measurementValue
examples: normal distribution with variation of 2 m

dwc:measurementUnit.description: The units associated with the dwc:measurementValue

dwciri:measurementUnit.description: The units associated with the dwc:measurementValue

dwc:measurementMethod.description: A description of or reference to (publication, URI) the method or protocol used to determine the measurement, fact, characteristic, or assertion

dwciri:measurementMethod.description: A description of or reference to (publication, URI) the method or protocol used to determine the measurement, fact, characteristic, or assertion

dwc:measurementRemarks.description: Comments or notes accompanying the dwc:MeasurementOrFact
examples: The length was measured from the tip of the nose to the end of the tail

ods:hasAgents.description: The agent(s) who made the assertion, contains an ods:Agent object

ods:hasCitations.description: Contains the publication citation(s) that support the assertion
